home.dynamicOnlineVisualizationsText: Dynamic dashboards powered by Kibana make it easy to search and analyze usage data.
home.centralizedRepositoryText: ezMESURE is a national repository centralizing the usage statistics of the digital documentation of higher education and research institutions (HEIs).
home.dataProducedByEzPAARSEText: Data are produced by the different ezPAARSE facilities in the HEIs before being aggregated in ezMESURE.

myspace.title: My Profile
myspace.noMemberships: You're not a member of any institution yet.
myspace.determineAccessRight: In order to determine your access rights, we invite you to contact the ezMESURE team or the ezMESURE correspondent in your institution.
myspace.name: Name
myspace.whatDoesMemberships: Your access rights to data and dashboards hosted on ezMESURE.

files.title: My Deposits
files.name: Name
files.isNotCSV: This file is not a CSV
files.markFieldIncorrectlyFormatted: Row #${lineNumber}: A field in quotes is formatted incorrectly.
files.invalidField: Line #{lineNumber}: "{field}" is not valid, has the file been modified ?

depositFiles.text: Deposit here the consultation event files that you want to load in ezMESURE. Please note that the upload is {not} immediate, and will be done by us as soon as possible. We invite you to read our {bestPracticeLink} in order to facilitate the process, and to get in touch with the team if you wish to know more about the automation of loading. Loaded data is not accessible to other filers.

kibana.title: Kibana identifiers
kibana.newPasswordSentByEmail: An email has been sent to you to reset your password.

resetPassword.text: Don't remember your password? Click on {reset} to receive a reset email.

whatDoesUsername.text: This username allows you to connect to the Kibana interface in order to access your dashboards. To change your password, go to your {accountLink}.

token.title: Authentication token

whatDoesToken.text: This token is required to use the ezMESURE API. To use it, add the following header to your HTTP requests: {header}

token.copyFailed: The copy of the token failed

activity.noActivity: This period has no registered activity

endpoints.title: SUSHI endpoints ({count})
endpoints.pageDescription: Here you can manage the list of the available SUSHI endpoints.
endpoints.pageDescription2: Only version 5 of the SUSHI protocol is supported.
endpoints.soapWarning: The URL seems to point to an unsupported SUSHI endpoint (version 4 or below)
endpoints.sushiNotRootDetected: It seems that the SUSHI URL does not point to the root of the service. It should not contain /reports, /status ou /member.
endpoints.paramSeparatorDesc: ezMESURE automatically adds {0}, {1} and {2} parameters while harvesting. If the endpoint does not accept the standard separator {separator} for this multivalued fields, please enter the separator here.
endpoints.pleaseEnterParams: If requests to the endpoint require additional parameters in the querystring, enter them below.
endpoints.deleteNbEndpoints: You are about to delete {number} endpoints.

institutions.title: Institution

deleteNbInstitutions.text: You are about to delete {number} institutions. {affected}
deleteNbInstitutions.affected: The associated spaces and roles will be deleted. The associated indices will stay unaffected. This action cannot be undone.

institutions.notMember: You don't belong to an institution yet.
institutions.doesNotExist: The institution you are trying to access is not registered.
institutions.noInstitutions: You're not attached to a institution.
institutions.institutionFoundDeclareNewInstitution: Your institution is not declared, declare a new institution.
institutions.sendMailToJoin: An email has been sent to the institution's correspondents
institutions.joinInstitutionEmail: A message will be sent to the correspondents of this institution to let them know.

filters.title: Filter institutions
filters.searchHint: This field is override by the search bar
filters.exclusiveHint: Institution must match exactly this filter
filters.inclusiveHint: Institution can match partially this filter

institution.title: My institution
institution.name: Institution name
institution.namespaceHint: Prefix added to entities related to the institution (repositories, Kibana spaces)
institution.invalidImageFile: Invalid image file. Accepted file types: JPEG, PNG, SVG
institution.imageTooLarge: Image is too large. Maximum allowed size: 2mb
institution.noDataFound: Your institution's information could not be retrieved.
institution.noAttachedDomains: There's no domain attached to this institution yet.
institution.searchOpenDataHint: Search an institution by name, location, UAI code, siret number...

members.title: Members ({total})
members.creator: Creator
members.name: Name
members.failedToAdd: Failed to add member, please try again later
members.failedToSearch: The search failed, please try again
members.readPermDesc: The user can view the Kibana dashboards, but can't modify them.
members.writePermDesc: The user can view and modify Kibana dashboards.

sushi.title: SUSHI credentials ({total})
sushi.pageDescription: Here you can enter the SUSHI credentials that will be used to automatically harvest your COUNTER reports.
sushi.pageDescription2: Only version 5 of the SUSHI protocol is supported.
sushi.unabletToRetriveSushiInformations: Unable to retrieve information from sushi platforms
sushi.label: Label
sushi.tagsDescription: The tags defined here will be usable in your dashboards, using the X_Tags field
sushi.necessaryField: This field is required for this platform
sushi.pleaseEnterParams: If requests to the Sushi endpoint require additional parameters in the querystring, enter them below.
sushi.resetNbChecks: You will reset {count} connection states. Untested identifiers are not taken into account.
sushi.cannotResetCheck: Failed to reset connection status for {name}
sushi.connectionSuccessfulDesc: A test report has been successfuly downloaded, or generated errors that are not related to authentication (ex: unavailable period).
sushi.connectionFailedDesc: An error occurred when communicating with the endpoint. The team is in contact with the publisher to find out why.
sushi.connectionUnauthorizedDesc: An authentication issue prevented the test report from being downloaded. Check your credentials.
sushi.connectionUntestedDesc: Authentication to the endpoint has not been tested yet.
sushi.resumeEntryDesc: You have declared the completion of your credentials on {date}. Do you want to resume your entry ?

readyPopup.inProgress: Your credentials are still being entered. When they are ready to be harvested, declare the completion of your entry by clicking on the button below.
readyPopup.completed: You have declared the completion of your credentials on {date}. These will be eligible to be included in future harvesting rounds. If adjustments are still needed, please declare it by clicking on the button below.

institutions.notAttachedToAnyInstitution: You are not attached to any institution, where you have not declared any information about your institution.

statusDescriptions.waiting: A harvest has been scheduled. It will be launched as soon as possible.
statusDescriptions.delayed: The harvest has been initiated, but the report was not ready yet. A new attempt will be made soon.

exceptionMeaning.network_error: An issue occurred while communicating with the endpoint.
exceptionMeaning.invalid_json: The downloaded report is not in the good format (JSON), or has syntax issues.
exceptionMeaning.max_defferals_exceeded: After several attempts, the report was still not ready.
exceptionMeaning.unauthorized: Authentication to the endpoint failed. Check that your credentials are entered correctly.
exceptionMeaning.invalid_report: The downloaded report is not valid, or include changes that are not SUSHI compliant.
exceptionMeaning.sushi:1000: The report could not be harvested because the endpoint is unreachable.
exceptionMeaning.sushi:1010: The endpoint is unable to provide the report because it's under heavy load.
exceptionMeaning.sushi:1020: The endpoint refuses to provide the report because the number of requests is too high.
exceptionMeaning.sushi:1030: The endpoint was unable to provide the report due to a lack of information provided with the request.
exceptionMeaning.sushi:2000: The endpoint refuses to provide the report because the requestor is not authorized. Check that your credentials are entered correctly.
exceptionMeaning.sushi:2010: The endpoint refuses to provide the report because the requestor is not authorized. Check that your credentials are entered correctly.
exceptionMeaning.sushi:2020: The endpoint refuses to provide the report because the provided API key is not valid. Check that your credentials are entered correctly.
exceptionMeaning.sushi:2030: The endpoint refuses to provide the report because the IP address is not authorized. Make sure that the IP address of ezMESURE is correctly declared to the endpoint.
exceptionMeaning.sushi:3000: The endpoint is unable to provide the report because it's not supported.
exceptionMeaning.sushi:3010: The endpoint is unable to provide the report because the requested version is not supported.
exceptionMeaning.sushi:3020: The period requested from the endpoint is invalid. The report may not be available yet.
exceptionMeaning.sushi:3030: The report is not available yet for the requested period.

sushi.unableToGetLockStatus: Failed to retrieve credentials lock status
sushi.managementIsLocked: SUSHI credentials management is currently locked.

sushi.nErrsCredentials: 1 credential show that endpoint is problematic|{count} credentials show that endpoint is problematic

sushi.unchangeableParam: Unchangeable parameter defined at the access point level.
sushi.failedItems: {count} report items could not be retrieved.

reports.sushiReturnedErrors: The SUSHI endpoint responded with errors.
reports.supportedReportsOnPlatform: Reports supported by the publisher platform
reports.failedToFetchReports: Failed to fetch the list of available reports

description.notSynced: The data of ezMESURE are not yet synchronized, you may encounter some incoherences between ezMESURE's interface and the different services linked to ezMESURE. Just click on the button above to synchronize.
description.completed: The data of ezMESURE have been successfully synchronized with the different services linked to ezMESURE.
description.error: An error occurred during the synchronization of ezMESURE data with the different services linked to ezMESURE. Please check your instance logs for more information.

sync.unableToRetrieveInformation: Unable to retrieve information about synchronization
